Granted, you never met anyone in your life except your parents and now have a cube for a companion.

I wish names would start making sense again.

Granted, they now do, and you don't know wich to follow |

I wish what you just granted to be true.

Granted. Your wish is true. That is all.

Edited June 3, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted, but under one condition - the universe will stop existing.

I wish for more ponies everywhere.

Granted! But they really are "Everywhere" so the planet is overpopulated with ponies... You get kicked in the balls every 2 seconds by pony's hooves... Have fun!

I wish I was a redhead.

Granted. See ya later, soul!

I wish I didn't procrastinate so much.

Granted. You're getting bored because your to-do-list was completed yesterday, one month ahead of schedule.

I wish I didn't have to poke around in people's guts in my job.

Granted, you get Grelzak's job of rectal probing instead.

I wish for mad skills yo.

Granted. You are locked into asylum for being mad.

I wish for a pet rock.

Granted. Mt. Everest is now in what was once your bedroom, with you underneath it.

I wish for pie.

Granted, but the never ending decimals make you so stuffed that you want to puke. From now on, you can't even stand the thought of pi.

I wish for a DVD of that Garfield show from 15 years ago or something.

Granted, but it's scratched beyond repair.

I wish for my own rocket.

Granted - It's a SSTO rocket that can reach the moon and return, fuel is free, but the universe has been patched up and the stacked intakes in the fuel tank make the rocket go boom.

I wish for (prepared) bacon & eggs.

granted but they eat you then each other before you can do what you expected

i wish nothing.

Granted. The universe is no more.

I wish for winter.

Granted.

I wish for summer.

granted the earth move @pix~+-n/lambdaexpepsilon due to this you can't enjoy it as your no longer there

I still wish nothing.

The genie becomes enraged and attacks you.

I wish for my next wish to come out exactly the way I want it to.
